query:
SELECT 1 as exists_check
            FROM ledger_atom la
            JOIN ledger_entry le ON la.atom_hash = le.link_hash
            WHERE le.container_id = 'C.Messenger'
              AND la.atom_data->>'type' = 'message.sent'
              AND la.atom_data->'payload'->'card'->>'card_id' = $1
            LIMIT 1
